name: Mirror: The Parallel World
description:
Somewhere we all are scared of mirrors, having listened to ghost stories of spirits being trapped inside mirrors.

"Mirror: The Parallel World" is a 2d Puzzle-Platformer where you control the player in one dimension and the threats can be seen in another dimension. You must break the mirror so that the threats in another dimension can be eliminated.

Use WASD to move and space to jump, while walking hold shift to run....
